ItemComponent.item_name: Ghost that whispers in a language you don't understand

ItemComponent.ui_description: Hey! Hope you like the cool effects on this wand. Unfortunately, it has about 800 particle emitters on it, which makes the game a bit unhappy. If you exit Noita with this in your inventory it takes about 1.5 minutes for it to finish saving.. If you drop the wand beforehand though, it works just fine! So just keep that in mind if you do a mod restart or something. Enjoy!
